text: Contraband is an American action crime thriller movie. It was directed by Baltasar Kormákur. It stars Mark Wahlberg and Kate Beckinsale. The movie is a remake of the 2008 Icelandic movie Reykjavík-Rotterdam which starred Kormákur. Contraband was released on January 13, 2012 in the United States by Universal Pictures. Filming took place in New Orleans, Louisiana and Panama City. Contraband was released to DVD on April 24, 2012 with a rating of R. ==Cast== *Mark Wahlberg as Chris Farraday *Kate Beckinsale as Kate Farraday *Ben Foster as Sebastian Abney *Caleb Landry Jones as Andy *Giovanni Ribisi as Tim Briggs *Lukas Haas as Danny Raymer *J. K. title: Contraband (2012 movie)
